content: cloud of softness cowl size one size approx 8 tall and 21 around made to fit snugly but gently near the neck so that you can enjoy the lovely soft yarn materials one skein of lang yak 70% merino/30% yak 50g/132 yds circular needle 16 long size 10 gauge approximately 15 stitches = 4 directions cast on 80 stitches place marker and join being careful not to twist purl 3 row begin pattern stitch row 1 & 2 k row 3 k3 p1 repeat around row 4 & 5 k row 6 k1 p1 k3 repeat around until 3 stitches are left p1 k2 repeat pattern sequence a total of 7 times knit 2 more rounds purl 2 rounds bind off in purl weave in your ends and wash in cold water with eucalan or mild wool wash gently squeeze out and roll in a clean towel to get out any excess water lay flat to dry then put on and swoon abbrevi ations k=knit p=purl k2tog= knit 2 together pm= place marker kf&b= increase by knitting into the front & back of stitch m1= make 1 stitch by inserting left needle under the bar in between stitches from front to back and then knit the lifted strand through the back to twist it as you make a stitch you can also insert needle from back to front and knit into the front ssk= slip 2 sts one at a time as if to knit insert left needle into fronts of these 2 sts from left to right and k2tog in this position y/o= yarn over bring yarn in between and then over right hand needle ws= wrong side rs= right side __________________________________________________________________________________________ 381 salmon brook street granby ct 06035 860 653-9700 www marjisyarncrafts com this pattern was written by marji lafreniere exclusively for marji s yarncrafts this pattern is not for use by others to make items for sale and not to be copied without permission
